"The Man on the Moon: A Graphic Novel" - A visually stunning graphic novel that retells the story of the Apollo 11 mission and the historic moment when Neil Armstrong became the first human to walk on the moon.
"The Man on the Moon: A Musical" - A theatrical production that combines music, dance, and drama to tell the story of the Apollo 11 mission and the human achievement of landing on the moon.

"The Man on the Moon: A Virtual Reality Experience" - A virtual reality experience that transports users to the moon and allows them to explore the lunar landscape and experience the moments of the Apollo 11 mission as if they were.

"The Man on the Moon: A Video Game" - A video game that recreates the Apollo 11 mission and challenges players to complete various tasks and missions on the moon, such as collecting samples and conducting experiments.
"The Man on the Moon: A Documentary" - A documentary that explores the history and significance of the Apollo 11 mission and the impact it had on human space exploration and the world.
